Text:
Many thanks. I have been waiting for these to be torrented since the 4th and final season started.

Hopefully some other channel picks them up since the one that runs this is being shut down.

hypothetical, you are very welcome.  I searched and searched for torrents to this show and came up totally empty handed. So, I learned how to encode and create torrents. yay! 

It's a shame that this is the final season.  Like you, I hope another network picks it up!
Thanks so much for putting this um im a HUGE Solitary Fan
